title: I don't think increasing Rageblade's cost by 300 is going to do much
body: It will only slightly delay the abuse champions from reaching their massive powerspike with the item.  Right now it gives 5k gold worth of stats without its passive and with its passive it goes up to nearly 6k.  For an item that costs less than 3k gold.  That's over 200% gold efficiency.  Riot either needs to make it harder to ramp up the stacks or nerf the stats and/or the passive.

I'd honestly rather see the item simply deleted. Riot has said a thousand times over, balancing a hybrid item is near impossible, which is why the old Rageblade was never buffed for fear it would cause issues and low and behold, it has abusers galore. 

AS, AD, and AP all at once make Kayle, Jax, Irelia, Fizz, and every devourer jungler ever a bit overly happy.
